column4: Why does  "Search for Files" not find 'places.sqlite' although locate finds 3 files? "Search for Files" searches the whole file system.
maybe its some option. I always use find in command line
Yes, may be it is an option. Sorry that you did not tell me which one. I have tried them all.
assup man?

You are wrong. /usr/bin/paplay exists in Ubuntu 8.04.1.
